title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Diana Wiley is a board certified sex therapist, marriage and family therapist, and a gerontologist practicing at the Seattle Institute for Sex Therapy, Education and Research.
 She is also clinical assistant professor in the Department of Sexology for the American Academy of Clinical Sexologists.
 As a specialist in the relationship between sexuality and aging, Dr Wiley was selected as Clinton Presidential Delegate for the White House conference on aging in 1995.
 She has published many articles in medical and popular publications and collaborated with urologist Dr Cully Carson to narrate the video “A Couples Guide to Great Sex over 40″ through the Sinclair Intimacy Institute.
Dr Wiley hosts the popular program “Love, Lust and Laughter” every Wednesday at 5:00pm EST on the Progressive Radio Network.
